name: Rikbit
tag_list: lebanon, outing, startup, group, social, activities, outdoors, sports, dining, experience
overview:
At Rikbit, we believe in helping people go out more for the sake of exploring new experiences, breaking the routine and meeting new people.

In a rapid moving social world, where people are always consumed by their daily routines, many of us have become perhaps even more disconnected. Despite the peopleâ€™s engagement in the multiple social networks and applications, organizing the simplest get-together can still be anything but simple.

Rikbit brings you the best online solution for organizing group activities. We have the remedy for the hassles of arranging a group outing. This idea is now possible thanks to introducing the new concept of an online marketplace for group activities, where organizers can post their activities and different customers would come together and book their favorite activities right away!

In other words, you can simply get in touch with a group of like-minded people and join or plan activities like going for an outdoor trip, group dinners, football games, cooking session, and anything else you can think of.
